channel.title: Help with moving username
channel.description:
I was wondering how to move the user name to the corner of the screen like the yellow box is, and bring the line down as well. :confused: I was told to look into the client.java and look for something similar to,
you're looking for a method call, with a number, then an x coord, then a y coord so it'd look like: method(12312, 500, 100
[img]http://i33.tinypic.com/21obfol.jpg[/img] thanks ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2008, 02:38:09 pm[/size][hr]What's with the 900+ views but 0 posts?!
